name: Mind Jet (Andrei Dumbravescu)
description:
Mind Jet is an endless runner in which you have to learn a set of directions in order to traverse safely  through while also avoiding obstacles.

Team:

Andrei Dumbravescu – Lead Designer
Louis Vagner – Lead Programmer
Charlotte Spurgeon – Designer, Programmer, 2D Artist, Music
Joshua Stafford – Designer, 3D Artist, Sound Design
